amendment.description: An amendment to insert language requiring that data used be the most timely and accurate data available relating to damages from such hurricanes.

action.text: Mr. Lewis (CA) raised a point of order against the Brady (TX) amendment (A020). The amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Brady (TX).
